tool_description: The Text-to-Speech API is a powerful tool that converts written text into natural-sounding speech, allowing applications and devices to communicate with users through spoken language.
name: Text To Speach API
title: Text To Speach API

api_list.name: Text To Speech
api_list.description: The "Text-to-Speech" endpoint enables users to convert textual input into high-quality, human-like speech, facilitating seamless integration of spoken content into applications, devices, or services.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speach-api.p.rapidapi.com/text-to-speech"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speach-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speach-api.p.rapidapi.com/text-to-speech"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speach-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
